item.title: Creative coding
item.description: Creative coding Introduction My research imperatives run along the threads of transmediation, intersemiotic translation, post-disciplinarity (interdisciplinarity, multidiscplinarity) and the general concerns of Human Computer Interaction (HCI). Key words: big-data, connectivity, interdisciplinarity, interconnection, machine learning, multidisciplinarity, real-time, sonification,streaming, visualisation, web Science and art "The L-Systems, also known as Lindenmayer Systems, are a class of algorithms for the production of structures based on recursive rewriting rules. “The L-systems are widely used in the composition of graphics mainly for the production of complex forms of plants as well as the imitation of other natural forms ”(Prusinkiewicz and Lindenmayer 1990; Rozenberg and Grzegorz 1992).
